title: qwantum
author: qwantum
content: Hello, have for sale amazon.co.jp gift cards, also can provide stuff with shipping (international supported).Amazon balance possible to use at any pay.amazon.com stores. Also in all in-app purchase from amazon app store Looking for 65% deals. Contact: Telegram

comments.author: Podgor
comments.body: You sell Japanese balance but claim it can be used on amazon.com? how so?
